reviews.review: The game is good the only thing is that the anti cheat sucks and the ranking system doesn't work. The gameplay is really good and the servers too. 9/10
Very fun game when you played it with friends
Very good game but too many cheaters. Stats and leaderboards would be nice.
this game has become more sh1tty over the last years. It used to be okay, but now it's not.
1000 hours in this game still beats valorant not gonna lie. OG the best.
